column2: BRIEF-Teekay Tankers Reports Q1 Gaap Loss Per Share Of $0.07 May 17 (Reuters) - Teekay Tankers Ltd: * Q1 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $-0.08 -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S * DECIDED TO ELIMINATE MINIMUM DIVIDEND PAYMENT, WHICH WILL RESULT IN RETAINING APPROXIMATELY $32 MILLION OF CASH FLOW ANNUALLY * QTRLY TOTAL GAAP REVENUES $168.5 MILLION VERSUS $130.5 MILLION Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
